current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To require the Secretary of the Air Force to retain the
		  current leadership rank, aircraft, and core functions of the 354th Fighter Wing
		  and the 18th Aggressor Squadron at Eielson Air Force Base and to require
		  reports on proposed activities at such installation.

sponsor.#tail:
introduced
			 the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

short-title.#text:
America Needs Eielson Air Force
			 Base Act of 2013

text.#text:
This Act may be cited as
			 the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
shall retain
			 the current leadership rank, aircraft, and core functions of the 354th Fighter
			 Wing and the 18th Aggressor Squadron at Eielson Air Force Base, Alaska, with
			 the same integrated mission elements, responsibilities, and capabilities as
			 existed as of November 1, 2011, until the later of—

header.#text:
Retention of
			 leadership rank, aircraft, and core functions of the 354th Fighter Wing and the
			 18th Aggressor Squadron at Eielson Air Force Base, Alaska

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: submits to the congressional defense committees the report required under

text.#text:
the date that is
			 180 days after the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: section 363 of the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2013
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2013/s:363

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
submits to the congressional defense committees the report
			 required under

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: America Needs Eielson Air Force Base Act of 2013/s:3/ss:a

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, shall submit
			 to the congressional defense committees a report on the strategic importance of
			 Eielson Air Force Base.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: America Needs Eielson Air Force Base Act of 2013/s:3/ss:a/p:1

text.#text:
an analysis of
			 the strategic value of Eielson Air Force Base to operations in the Pacific Area
			 of Responsibility and elsewhere; including the geographic advantage of Eielson
			 Air Force Base in global deployment of airpower, military personnel, and
			 logistical support;

the potential for
			 relocation of combat coded aircraft from overseas bases;

maintenance and
			 expansion of the North Pacific air refueling bridge;

proximity of
			 Eielson Air Force Base to the Joint Pacific Alaska Range Complex.

header.#text:
Environmental
			 Impact Statement and Record of Decision

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
may not change the aircraft or core functions of the 354th Fighter
			 Wing and the 18th Aggressor Squadron at Eielson Air Force Base, Alaska, or the
			 integrated mission elements, responsibilities, and capabilities that existed at
			 such installation as of November 1, 2011, until the completion of an
			 Environmental Impact Statement and a Record of Decision relating to the
			 proposed changes.

and the Record of Decision shall reconcile the action
			 decided upon with the findings of the report.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: America Needs Eielson Air Force Base Act of 2013/s:3/ss:a

text.#text:
The Environmental
			 Impact Statement shall assess the information submitted in the report required
			 under
